sourcing.instructions: Aluminum powder can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online markets.
steps: Aluminum powder can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online markets.
1. Weigh each ingredient using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1200°C (2192°F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1200°C (2192°F).

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C or 68-77°F).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C or 68-77°F).

steps: 1. Once the solid sample has cooled, examine it for any irregularities or surface imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once the solid sample has cooled, examine it for any irregularities or surface imperfections.
